altername_name: Au Pays des PooYoos: Activites d'Eveil
name: Au pays des Pooyoos: Activités d'éveil
overview: Au pays des Pooyoos : Activités d'éveil (literally "In the Land of the Pooyoos: Discovery Activities") is a French video game designed for kids between 3 and 6 years old. The Pooyoos are colored baby animals who accompany the children on the path of writing and drawing learning. The game features 5 different workshops.
